objective.description: I am highly motivated professional with a strong background in Computer Engineering. I am seeking for a position where my work ethic, problem-solving skills, and passion for technology can contribute to the success of the team and make a positive impact.

education.degree: Bachelor of Applied Science - Computer Engineering

description: Developed a user-friendly interface for diverse sensors, including the Intel RealSense IMU, facilitating acquisition and interpretation of location and angle readings
Collaborated on the integration of backend functionalities for a control website, and the incorporation of OpenCV features to enhance image processing capabilities

Conducted thorough research and analysis of electrical components for the Solar Bench Project, including battery, charge controllers, PV arrays, wires, and circuit breakers, ensuring optimal performance and functionality
Collaborated in the development of C++ code for an Arduino Current Sensor, enabling real-time monitoring and reporting of electrical current flow through charging outlets via the Arduino App

projects.name: AI Enhanced Application Security Testing Platform
description: Created a platform that provides a comprehensive interface for users to launch security tests and get live results and recommendations along with a chatbot for assistance
Leveraged AWS CDK to deploy the platform on AWS, utilizing services such as Amplify, S3, DynamoDB, and EKS and  for efficient resource management and data storage
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and AWS CDK to automate the deployment process, ensuring a streamlined and efficient workflow

Engineered a responsive, intuitive UI with React and TypeScript, integrated with DAST tools to strengthen application security testing, while empowering users to fully configure and control all testing parameters.

projects.name: Trailblazers, Android App
description: Created an app that allows users to find joggers nearby using google maps and OAUth
Leveraged testing frameworks such as Jest and Espresso to ensure 100% branch coverage on the backend implementation and end-to-end testing on the Android application
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Docker to automate the deployment process, ensuring a streamlined and efficient workflow

projects.name: Shopping Website
description: Successfully developed a full-stack dynamic shopping website using Express with EJS templates, MySQL, and Squares payments API

Implemented key shopping website features, including product and collection models, account login, newsletter subscription, search bar, self-updating checkout, and engaging effects such as Parallax and stackable header for mobile users
Demonstrated advanced CSS, JavaScript, and HTML skills to maintain a consistent and visually appealing format across all pages, ensuring a seamless user experience
Orchestrated captivating daily activities for groups of 20 K-7 children
Fostered a collaborative environment by maintaining open communication with a team of two instructors, enhancing camper safety, refining activity plans, and ensuring seamless coordination
Communicated actively with team members to ensure smooth product assembly
Provided excellent customer service by taking orders with attentiveness, kindness, and respect
Developed comprehensive lecture summaries for the Fundamental of Sustainable Engineering class, capturing essential concepts and insights emphasized by the professor and course materials
Applied visually engaging strategies like charts, keywords, and diagrams to enhance the comprehension of complex concepts
Collaborating on family online business and vendor markets
Volunteering on the Engineering Open House & Work Study Committee
